scripts.package:lambda: powershell -NoProfile -Command "if(Test-Path .lambda_pkg){Remove-Item .lambda_pkg -Recurse -Force}; if(Test-Path lambda.zip){Remove-Item lambda.zip -Force}; npm ci; npm run build; New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force .lambda_pkg | Out-Null; Copy-Item -Recurse -Force dist .lambda_pkg\\dist; Copy-Item package.json .lambda_pkg\\package.json; if(Test-Path package-lock.json){Copy-Item package-lock.json .lambda_pkg\\package-lock.json}; Push-Location .lambda_pkg; npm ci --omit=dev; Pop-Location; Compress-Archive -Path .lambda_pkg\\* -DestinationPath lambda.zip -Force; Write-Output 'Created lambda.zip'"
